link.title: ZCISD Learn-At-Home

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc
hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

li.p: ZCISD Learn-At-Home Program will begin week of April 6, 2020 in the event that the District extends school closures past this date.
Please return often to review updates. Versin en espaol prximamente

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.strong: For questions regarding instruction or assessment - please submit a request at:

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

span.strong: For technical difficulties - such as reseting passwords - please submit a request at:

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.jsaction: click:cOuCgd; mousedown:UX7yZ; mouseup:lbsD7e; mouseenter:tfO1Yc; mouseleave:JywGue; focus:AHmuwe; blur:O22p3e; contextmenu:mg9Pef;

li.p: Go to http://mail.google.com/
Your school e-mail is: your first name+the first letter of your last name @student.zcisd.org
Your password is: capital letter first name+lowercase letter of last name+student ID number

Example: Bruce Wayne has ID number 98765.
His e-mail is brucew@student.zcisd.org
His password is: Bw98765

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

li.p: Set up a workspace at home, if one does not already exist, to support a routine for continuing studies.
Stick to a schedule/routine.

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

span.strong: Need Internet Access? Necesita acceso a internet?

li.p:
Spectrum has removed the password from WiFi hotspots. To find local hotspots go to the link:
https://www.spectrum.com/wifi-hotspots
Enter our zip code 78076 and search - a list of 29 locations have Spectrum WiFi Indoor access.

Spectrum ha eliminado la contrasea de los puntos de acceso WiFi. Para encontrar puntos de acceso locales, vaya al enlace: https://www.spectrum.com/wifi-hotspots
Ingrese nuestro cdigo postal 78076 - una lista de 29 ubicaciones tiene acceso Spectrum WiFi Indoor

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

span.strong: Need additional educational tools for your child to use?

li.p: Check out the digital/online resources page
Check out parent dyslexia resources Accommodations for Virtual Platforms to Help Students at Home

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

li.p: Utilize Offline Learning Opportunities:
Schedule time for play
Use card games to practice math
Read a book out loud for the whole family to enjoy
Make time to do something creative
Practice an instrument
Write a story or keep a journal
Paint or Draw
Read the newspaper as a family

span.a: Khan Academy Schedules for School Closures

div.class: hJDwNd-AhqUyc-uQSCkd jXK9ad D2fZ2 OjCsFc wHaque GNzUNc

div.small: Notice of Nondiscrimination: It is the policy of Zapata County Independent School District (District) not to discriminate on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, handicap in its programs, services or activities as required by Title VI of the Civil Rights Act of 1964, as amended; Title IX of the Education Amendments of 1972; and Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, as amended. The District shall provide equal opportunities to all individuals within its jurisdiction or geographic boundaries. Education Code 1.002(a) No officer or employee of a district shall, when acting or purporting to act in an official capacity, refuse to permit any student to participate in any school program because of the students race, religion, color, sex, or national origin. Civ. Prac. & Rem. Code 106.001 The District may not deny services to any individual eligible to participate in its special education program, but it shall provide individuals with disabilities special educational services as authorized by law. Education Code 1.002(b).

Aviso de no discriminacin: Es la poltica del Distrito Escolar Independiente del Condado de Zapata ("Distrito") no discriminar por motivos de raza, color, origen nacional, sexo, discapacidad en sus programas, servicios o actividades como lo requiere el Ttulo VI de la Ley de Derechos Civiles de 1964, segn enmendado; Ttulo IX de las Enmiendas de Educacin de 1972; y la Seccin 504 de la Ley de Rehabilitacin de 1973, segn enmendada. El Distrito brindar igualdad de oportunidades a todas las personas dentro de su jurisdiccin o lmites geogrficos. Cdigo de Educacin 1.002 (a) Ningn funcionario o empleado de un distrito, cuando acte o pretenda actuar bajo su ttulo oficial, deber negar a ningn alumno la oportunidad de participar en un programa escolar debido a su raza, religin, color, sexo u origen nacional. Civ. Prac. Y Rem. 106.001. El Distrito no puede negar servicios a ninguna persona elegible para participar en su programa de educacin especial, pero debe de proporcionar servicios educativos especiales a personas con discapacidades segn lo autorice la ley. Cdigo de Educacin 1.002 (b). El Distrito Escolar Independiente del Condado de Zapata es un empleador que ofrece igualdad de oportunidades.
